channel.title: Need A Rs Clan? Look! ( :
channel.description:
--------------------- PILLS4SKILLS --------------------------- Ok guys look we are a new clan, but no fret. We enjoy rs as it is today and myself have been playing rs since the early days. Now we are active, new, a skilling clan, helpful, and just everything you could want. Here are the activities we do-- Clan Wars Clan Meetings Weekly Events We do more but cba to post here.
If you're interested in joining add me in-game My ign is Charleeshien OR Just join the clan as a guest and ask to join. BTW we ARE a 100+ clan. The clan anem is Pill4Skills ( :
